title: Donald Duck in Legend of the Three Caballeros
overview: This show is about the adventures of Donald Duck, JÃ³se Carioca and Panchito Pistoles (also know as the three Caballeros) as they travel around the world in search of the treasure that their ancestors had left for them. Along their adventure they come across new faces, new locations, and new enemies. "The Legend of the Three Caballeros" debuted exclusively on the DisneyLife app in the Philippines and is produced by Disney Interactive.
